review_texts: Classes are interactive and interesting. My speaking improved quickly.
Mentors help consistently and deliver feedback clearly and effectively.
Lessons are enriched with practical examples, so applying knowledge is easy.
The platform is very convenient, and access to lessons and resources is easy.
Teachers always listen attentively and provide the needed support.
Classes are very engaging and include all the listening materials needed.
Mentors teach through real-life examples, which makes learning more effective.
Group work with other students is very useful, with opportunities to share their opinions and experiences.
In each lesson, the teacher not only teaches but also encourages students to express their thoughts freely.
The curriculum is very good, but it would be even better with more practical exercises.
After finishing the course, I noticed major improvements in my English, and this course helped me grow.
join_thousands: Join thousands of students who have achieved fluency and opened new opportunities.
have_questions: Have questions about our courses? We're here to help you start your English learning journey.
help_text: Tell us how we can help you...
choose_path_description: Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to perfect your English, we have the right course for you.
slogan: Empowering students worldwide to master English through innovative online courses and personalized learning experiences.
hero1: founder of Act in Maximum and creator of LingUp, have set myself a goal ‚Äî to help young people master the English language and achieve their dreams.
hero2: LingUp is not just a course; it is new opportunities for you. With 15 years of experience, an IELTS 8.5, and over 5,000 students, I share the secrets of success.
hero3: Here, every lesson is built on strategies, practice, and proven systems that lead to great results. Thousands of students have achieved their dreams. Now it‚Äôs your turn!
